EmailTemplate.name: RE: PCSB Tech and Information Systems virtualized environment (1496145432.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: PCSB Tech and Information Systems virtualized environment (1496145432.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Tom, After looking through Pinellas County Public Schools website I can see that you and the infrastructure team at Pinellas County Public Schools made a significant investment to virtualize servers to save as you scale and grow. I was hoping that you and the team might have some time to over the next few weeks to have a 30 minute conversation around Turbonomic’s control platform to see how it helps our customers capitalize on the investment they made in virtualization. As mentioned in the video below, I think you will see a lot of value in our ability to take the complexity out of managing/optimizing your virtual infrastructure. Do you have 30 minutes over the couple of weeks for an introduction call? Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2017 8:14 AM To: 'lechnert@pcsb.org' <lechnert@pcsb.org> Subject: RE: PCSB Tech and Information Systems virtualized environment Hi Thomas, Below is a video of the CIO of BMC, Scott Crowder and his team explaining the value that he sees in Turbonomic after implementing the platform into their internal infrastructure. With Turbonomic, they were able to increase the capacity of their infrastructure by 25% while “performance went through the roof”. Cloud Economics with BMC | A Turbonomic Success Story <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5YdMHJKVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAk%2DhTzTtlKmUf4xCfLFh%5FNdo66m2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXYpwghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSdql6620%5Fo2wCUGGVUsPjJ00iSKKxzoeRQtnh20UkKStmjzS%5FukYUomHUC%2DNkltBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DOOR%5Ftjmim25gVMk7QhiekStxkXkj4qRT96qothamPH%5FrCHXzoh2N0QuIA9A7kUbDmNIV4hDgCw7vyMFza3L0BPPsjlS0YcnUvnIVE6EPG4Y%2C/j01QeM3JL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90xaeaLBU8VEJ9vzwFRGfPYc44N6udYBgy9SnbwhqeXeIRaeflnydNj8Kaq1WkG59%2DPkROTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5UvVzuX9lmUcNUBmSE6h5EKxZmxd5W113rlp2bV%5FT3WE0Nz6JKYwGmvFbBfvP4As3QjrQMCOLPS]]> I was hoping to get the chance introduce the platform to you and the team to see if we could provide the same value to the PCSB team. We are also offering a $15,000 discount to any state or local institution for the month of May for anyone that chooses to evaluate during the month of May because we know that usually governmental entities run a June/July fiscal year end. Do you have 30 minutes in the month of May for my team and I to introduce the platform to you and the team at Pinellas County Public Schools? Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Monday, May 8, 2017 7:56 AM To: 'lechnert@pcsb.org' <lechnert@pcsb.org <[[mailto:lechnert@pcsb.org]]>> Subject: PCSB Tech and Information Systems virtualized environment Thomas – After doing some research on the Technology and Information Systems’ infrastructure environment I think you would see a lot of value in our ability to allow teams to continue to scale out their virtualized infrastructure at a lower cost. Our control platform does what VMware’s VRops and VSphere <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jExRccLLKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAX65SjTrmoHbf4JcZbFhksJu8u6w0WRY%2DpuHikjeCBIjdFx1Yi6zcIZyiDbXBLlxchmDonn2E5chuyQDtYkDz6uxWKqa8UWr2XDk4BuEHUVTwMrIx2%5FsWLdnrdoti2A8xl0cdc3symbo5YV0kxVr7MJ9oE9p0cZrIps4uRKEeDDZ3KLtS7piUYzgybbDlM94bBMdnYcjInrQHnamNtjBbSRZ30K1mzphBxNYPwlXUPoswEGVhGJ4U%2DlcE3KOoAM5%5FVcTxaoLio7KvHaCal%2DzbAnYlweC6lL9dMdEhA%2C%2C/j0hQeMTJLFlNoVdlsbPWNKT5iifCdda%5Fsq9pAPao0cAzlkV7duXOKw793oRdTZk5MuDLXg8bB691zwcFSPigXat68NZYB1W%5FTjfJ1eSIScgcU7Um9ZZv9qKW8EYEhNyQhnDpMXZbElx5TzCoeqYJsRrOMZwWWEbU3j6SEQ%2C%2C]]> can’t because our automation engine gives the intelligence to virtual machines to size and place themselves within the environment, allowing teams to keep their environment in a perpetual state of health, enabling teams to: Assure Application Performance in Real Time o 80% decrease in tickets and alerts (become more operationally efficient) o Preventing problems before they become issues (we are the only platform that does this) Drive Efficiency in Environment o 40% increase in VM/Host Density as workloads get the intelligence to dictate the resources they need, saving hundreds of thousands of CapEx in the infrastructure.Capacity Plano Forecasting and tons of “what-if” scenarios around h/w refresh, DC moves, Consolidations etc...Below are some examples of how Turbonomic has helped other counties/public schools in the past but if you would like to see a live demonstration of the technology, please don’t hesitate to reach out and I’d be happy to arrange. Turbonomic ROI <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jExRccLLKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAX65SjTrmoHbf4JcZbFhksJu8u6w0WRY%2DpuHikjeCBIjdFx1Yi6zcIZyiDbXBLlxchmDonn2E5chuyQDtYkDz6uxWKqa8UWr2XDk4BuEHUVTwMrIx2%5FsWLdnrdoti2A8xl0cdc3symbo5YV0kxVr7MJ9oE9p0cZrIps4uRKEeDDZ3KLtS7piUYzgybbDlM94bBMdnYcjInrQHnamNtjBbSRZ30K1mzphBxNYPwlXUPoswEGVhGJ4U%2DlcE3KOoAM5%5FVcTxaoLio7KvHaCal%2DzbAnYlweC6lL9dMdEhA%2C%2C/j0lYdMfPK1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpxd9z2kdwZunBLA76mN9eHZYhKt2LEwAfHZ9syQ9nKM%2D8MpBE%5FKpQAFWNTDT03fPCWqxlS75Q2c118r6p7jVA%2DPvHwH7NXGZZTnhmVy67aJEhlinLFagaClGq71D3AJQ6tR0vrLwI45XuLpfxqFc%2C]]> Seminole County Public Schools: <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jEtWdsbOI1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhRDkK6Vj7tlIHKbJ5MP7th24d09qz4iCYAssmQkwHhPWIXRllCfT%5FPZbQQsBS1HYonBwGw3GvDEosorBwMjJAO58eFSYaj10eO%5FGqUxSGgE2QtyeLK4nGICJNGr%5F0IhUwe438SerPYsRyU7591sAgx2L9xqiZ29K4iechlxgezZgn24N30XNE8G%2DGDuNCjv%5FADeRw60pEvTEPEEAnqG4ywV3NI%5FBzVoxAWBQpnBAReIcUmljezs3ptWuw7YTi8miABzG0s5K9v9r%5FhiCLIfXq4bjDHtk32lknmbw%2C%2C/j0FVcsLGLllNoVdlsbPWJbvomjvDc4qrt7kzH%5Fryx9081gZ9feGAPVn7jcFfHZ5%5FaeCQCkwaAIBgnxlKFr2daJRQ6bAOKgTgfn6tprXPfY9Bf7t%2D1cIv%5FKeonTIjvc3PkVPCHUoAVDQ%2DQhONZbAhgC6iYrYXShGF9XXOOI4g0RsrtY5J5Yeofran6D6T4UvU9XueMFc76cqP1UizB8Q4g%2DIglHsuy1R3T%2DHg1jndh%2D4HrC9u2P1lyE5N%2DMRkEMhCpUGvfXTn3bfBGrpDV56EpfHrlcgORh87voJrKEqUen8%2C]]> With Turbonomic’s real-time capacity management to simulate a migration from old Dell hosts to new Cisco UCS blades, the team learned they could consolidate from 12 hosts down to 3, enabling them to save nearly $80,000. These funds can now be reallocated to new projects focused on innovation, such as collapsing and centralizing much of their remote site infrastructure to enable more unified IT management. Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5TecbML1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhRDkK6Vj7tlIHKbJ5MP7th24d09qz4iCYAssmQkwHhPXpfRllCfT%5FPZbQQsBS1HYonBwGw3GvDEosorB8l0IQO%5F4WRSYrk10erpmvhxSGgEGRqyuLK43K2NclGr9QZknUJ8n4rRLDY%2DRfO7LV1sAgx2L9xqiZ29K4iechlxgezZgn24N30XNE8G%2DGDuNCjv%5FADeRw60pEvTEPEEAnqG4ywV3NI%5FBzVoxAWBQpnBAVgPsEhuzejqEF5VcEMSxqimyRyzGsG2b5b16vMtBe%5FOELdbjrXiSq7yAGSeLg12mSXlukrzA3hJAfj8%5FZhAxC1NMGK%5FBP2ANY%2C/j0lYdszPK1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%5FKjgaMJQw8g1OL%2DyPOdJi%5F%5FwIJlCgHWndjpnMX4xkNOZV%5F5FlxpCcjTIov%5Fa0p0%5FVIHopaXBgUQHYOptl1xmkPJ80WhHK83XHJ4YwiDodhqkRxJfmfryn72A%2C]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5TecbML1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhRDkK6Vj7tlIHKbJ5MP7th24d09qz4iCYAssmQkwHhPXpfRllCfT%5FPZbQQsBS1HYonBwGw3GvDEosorB8l0IQO%5F4WRSYrk10erpmvhxSGgEGRqyuLK43K2NclGr9QZknUJ8n4rRLDY%2DRfO7LV1sAgx2L9xqiZ29K4iechlxgezZgn24N30XNE8G%2DGDuNCjv%5FADeRw60pEvTEPEEAnqG4ywV3NI%5FBzVoxAWBQpnBAVgPsEhuzejqEF5VcEMSxqimyRyzGsG2b5b16vMtBe%5FOELdbjrXiSq7yAGSeLg12mSXlukrzA3hJAfj8%5FZhAxC1NMGK%5FBP2ANY%2C/h05Tc8LGdlBQuVN5sfaYL6z%2D0SLJdpuno5xpHOXk3cEx1EF9PO%5FANR7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpCxF1qG%5FagcJoFqNdYAhSfSSm60oPUV5t%2DcJ42judCr6yc4FlQ%2DPCXuWr5GlYndVZFZQqobvpzoHi0FA%2C%2C]]> Going to Cisco Live?
